column5: Well our son Connor is already over 3 months old...  WOW  Time really does fly by with children...  Heres some pics of our bundle of joy...            BTW... He's a blanky baby...
Great pics Mike...thanks for sharing those. I had to laugh, my boy Jack had an elephant too...he would chew the trunk too...he thought it was hilarious.
Hes got a great pair of hands too Dad says he will be holding a rod by the time he is 2
